  • Constructor Details

    • Transaction

      public Transaction(String tid, User user, int amount, String datetime, String created_at, String modified_at, String description)
      Transaction object constructor. The transaction ID is automatically constructed as input date + sequence number, or can be customized. Transaction ID can only be defined at creation time. Four constructors are provided: all customized; all customized + tags; custom transaction details + tags + default ID and time; all default. 交易对象构造函数，交易ID自动构造为输入日期+序号，或可以自定义，交易ID只在创建时可定义。 提供四种构造函数，全部自定义；全部自定义+tags；自定义交易细节+tags+默认ID和时间；全部默认。
